properties.areaDesc: Lake Huron from 5NM east of Mackinac Bridge to Presque Isle Lt  to the US/Canadian border beyond 5 NM from shore; Lake Huron from Presque Isle Lt. to Sturgeon Point  MI 5NM off shore to US/Canadian border
properties.headline: Gale Watch issued January 4 at 9:46PM EST until January 6 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Expect sustained winds up to 27 knots from the west
with gusts up to 37 knots. The largest significant waves will
be 8 feet with a potential maximum wave height of 11 feet.

* WHERE...Lake Huron from 5NM east of Mackinac Bridge to Presque
Isle Lt beyond 5 NM off shore and Lake Huron from Presque Isle
Light to Sturgeon Point MI beyond 5NM off shore.

* WHEN...The maximum winds are expected around 4 AM EST Monday
with the largest waves expected around 6 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and waves.

NWSheadline: GALE WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING
